mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.cheliang_uuid_number as cheliangUuidNumber ,a.cheliang_types as cheliangTypes ,a.cheliang_photo as cheliangPhoto ,a.cheliang_xinghao as cheliangXinghao ,a.cheliang_yanse as cheliangYanse ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.news_content as newsContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM cheliang a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.cheliang_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangUuidNumber},'%')
and a.cheliang_types = #{params.cheliangTypes}
and a.cheliang_xinghao like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangXinghao},'%')
and a.cheliang_yanse like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangYanse},'%')
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.news_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.newsContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
